actions.name: CreateAccessor
actions.description: Grants permission to create an Amazon Managed Blockchain accessor

actions.name: CreateMember
actions.description: Grants permission to create a member of an Amazon Managed Blockchain network

actions.name: CreateNetwork
actions.description: Grants permission to create an Amazon Managed Blockchain network

actions.name: CreateNode
actions.description: Grants permission to create a node within a member of an Amazon Managed Blockchain network

actions.name: CreateProposal
actions.description: Grants permission to create a proposal that other blockchain network members can vote on to add or remove a member in an Amazon Managed Blockchain network

actions.name: DeleteAccessor
actions.description: Grants permission to delete an Amazon Managed Blockchain accessor owned by the current AWS account

actions.name: DeleteMember
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a member and all associated resources from an Amazon Managed Blockchain network

actions.name: DeleteNode
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a node from a member of an Amazon Managed Blockchain network

actions.name: GET
actions.description: Grants permission to send HTTP GET requests to an Ethereum node

actions.name: GetAccessor
actions.description: Grants permission to return detailed information about an Amazon Managed Blockchain accessor owned by the current AWS account

actions.name: GetMember
actions.description: Grants permission to return detailed information about a member of an Amazon Managed Blockchain network

actions.name: GetNetwork
actions.description: Grants permission to return detailed information about an Amazon Managed Blockchain network

actions.name: GetNode
actions.description: Grants permission to return detailed information about a node within a member of an Amazon Managed Blockchain network

actions.name: GetProposal
actions.description: Grants permission to return detailed information about a proposal of an Amazon Managed Blockchain network

actions.name: Invoke
actions.description: Grants permission to create WebSocket connections to an Ethereum node

actions.name: ListAccessors
actions.description: Grants permission to list the Amazon Managed Blockchain accessors owned by the current AWS account

actions.name: ListInvitations
actions.description: Grants permission to list the invitations extended to the active AWS account from any Managed Blockchain network

actions.name: ListMembers
actions.description: Grants permission to list the members of an Amazon Managed Blockchain network and the properties of their memberships

actions.name: ListNetworks
actions.description: Grants permission to list the Amazon Managed Blockchain networks in which the current AWS account participates

actions.name: ListNodes
actions.description: Grants permission to list the nodes within a member of an Amazon Managed Blockchain network

actions.name: ListProposalVotes
actions.description: Grants permission to list all votes for a proposal, including the value of the vote and the unique identifier of the member that cast the vote for the given Amazon Managed Blockchain network

actions.name: ListProposals
actions.description: Grants permission to list proposals for the given Amazon Managed Blockchain network

actions.name: ListTagsForResource
actions.description: Grants permission to view tags associated with an Amazon Managed Blockchain resource

actions.name: POST
actions.description: Grants permission to send HTTP POST requests to an Ethereum node

actions.name: RejectInvitation
actions.description: Grants permission to reject the invitation to join the blockchain network

actions.name: TagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to add tags to an Amazon Managed Blockchain resource

actions.name: UntagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to remove tags from an Amazon Managed Blockchain resource

actions.name: UpdateMember
actions.description: Grants permission to update a member of an Amazon Managed Blockchain network

actions.name: UpdateNode
actions.description: Grants permission to update a node from a member of an Amazon Managed Blockchain network

actions.name: VoteOnProposal
actions.description: Grants permission to cast a vote for a proposal on behalf of the blockchain network member specified
